p.s: Color conversion and mixing for PHP5
p.d: PHP5 color conversion and basic mixing. Currently supported color models: * CMYK - Used in printing. * Grayscale - Perceptively weighted grayscale. * Hex - Hex RGB colors i.e. #abcdef. * Hsl - Used in CSS3 to define colors. * Hsv - Used by Photoshop and other graphics pacakges. * Named - RGB value for named colors like black, khaki, etc. * WebsafeHex - Just like Hex but rounds to websafe colors.
